UPDATED - Scarlett Johansson Camouflages Her Baby Bump on First Red Carpet After Pregnancy Reveal

Scarlett Johansson has become engaged to her boyfriend Romain Dauriac.

Journalist Dauriac reportedly proposed to the actress about a month ago. They have been together for ten months.

"They're engaged and very happy," a source confirmed to People. See a picture of the ring below.

Johansson and Dauriac attended her Under the Skin premiere at the 70th Venice International Film Festival last night (September 3).

In February, she dismissed reports that the two were engaged.

Johansson previously said that she has rarely thought about marrying again due to her divorce from ex-husband Ryan Reynolds in December 2010.

↧

↧

Jamie Lynn Spears marries partner Jamie Watson in New Orleans?

Jamie Lynn Spears has reportedly married her partner Jamie Watson.

The younger sister of Britney Spears announced the news of her engagement last year. She posted a picture of the engagement ring on her Instagram page.

US sources (via E! Online) have reported that the couple tied the knot in New Orleans and held the reception at the Audubon Tea Room.

Spears is said to have worn a v-neck Liancarlo gown. Her daughter Maddie was flower girl, while Britney's two sons, Sean Preston and Jayden James, acted as ring bearers during the service.

The 22-year-old found fame when she was cast as the lead role in Nickelodeon show Zoey 101.

After falling pregnant at 16, Jamie Lynn got engaged to her daughter's father Casey Aldridge. The pair split up in 2010.

↧

Emma Watson: 'I envy actresses that didn't grow up in limelight'

Emma Watson said that she's jealous of the current crop of emerging actresses.

The 23-year-old is envious that the new stars didn't have to grow up in the spotlight.

Speaking to Elle, the cover star said: "There are all these actresses who have emerged in the last year or two, and they get to emerge as this complete human being. And I'm so jealous!"

She said that it was harder for child stars to separate their real-life from their on-screen experiences.

"I remember reading this thing that Elizabeth Taylor wrote," she said. "She had her first kiss in character. On a movie set. It really struck me. I don't know how or why, but I had this sense that if I wasn't really careful, that could be me.

"That my first kiss could be in somebody else's clothes. And my experiences could all belong to someone else."

The actress also spoke her upcoming role of Ila in the biblical film Noah.

"It's Shakespearean, what happens to this family when they're put in this confined space for 40 days and 40 nights.

"It's the end of the world – how these different human beings are dealing with the impact of that. Are humans good? Are we bad? All of these themes are epic."

Watson found fame at just 11-years-old when she was cast in Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone.

☆ ★ [[ V I E T N A M E S E net idols ❤ ]]

- - - - directory is updated!

Welcome to the vietnamese net idol thread!

What is a Net Idol?

A net idol is an internet term for a person that is popular online through their blogs, photo albums, personal websites, etc. They are popular for many reasons, but most of their time they are known for their LOOKS. Their pictures are often circulated throughout many forums/websites which is how they gain (and to also maintain) their popularity.

What is a VIETNAMESE Net Idol?

A Vietnamese net idol is similar to any other net idols--they achieve their popularity through the internet. The difference between a Vietnamese net idol to that of other countries' is that Vietnamese net idols are often people who "have made a name for themselves by being a socially active teen icon through the press and online community" (quoted from truffles14). They do NOT have to have the "best face" like what you would consider an "Uhlzzang".

So there are only Vietnamese Net Idols in Vietnam?

Vietnamese net idols are very well spread out. We've had a few that are from United States, to France, to Australia, and even Hong Kong. Most of these net idols are often not as popular as the ones in Vietnam, but they are still famous.

Can I post pictures of people I know?

NO. NO. NO. NO. NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO. We've had an incident where we did allow people to post their friends/relatives/random person, and it was a MESS.

UPDATED - 'Fifty Shades of Grey's' Jamie Dornan: Friend Won't See 'Disgusting' Movie

Emma Watson may have been confirmed as the female star of Fifty Shades of Grey

A group of online hackers known collectively as Anonymous reportedly hacked into the internal server of German studio Constantin film, and leaked several documents, including one relating to the upcoming Focus Features adaptation.

The document states that Watson is attached to star as naive college student Ana Steele, whose relationship with sexually sadistic billionaire Christian Grey is at the center of the erotic trilogy.

The hackers, who have previously leaked phone numbers and credit card information from celebrities including Beyoncé and Kanye West, boasted about their success on Twitter, and the leak was confirmed by The Hollywood Reporter.

Along with several documents relating to films that Constantin is considering for acquisition, the hackers also published a list of employees' email addresses.

It has long been rumored that Watson is a frontrunner for the role of Ana, although she herself has denied any involvement.

No director has yet been confirmed for the adaptation of EL James's bestselling novel, which is being written by Kelly Marcel and produced by Michael De Luca and Dana Brunetti (The Social Network).

↧

Tavia Yeung went under the knife to improve relationship with beau?

The Hong Kong actress has once again sparked plastic surgery rumours after she was spotted sporting fuller lips and nose

Hong Kong actress Tavia Yeung has once again sparked plastic surgery rumours after she was reportedly spotted sporting fuller lips and nose.

According to Hong Kong media, the 34-year-old Tavia has allegedly gone under the knife several times, reconstructing her nose and lips to maintain her looks and improve her relationship with her actor boyfriend Him Law, who is five years her junior - the couple got together after collaborating on On Call 36 Hours in 2012.

Her latest changes reportedly include a fuller nose, which is said to bring good fortune to one's partner, more voluptuous lips, a sharper chin and an immaculate complexion. With her features becoming more defined, she looks nothing like how she was when she first debuted.

When the media approached Tavia when she was working at the TVB City last Wednesday, the actress vehemently refused to allow photos of her side profile to be taken.

When asked to address the plastic surgery rumours, she admitted that she once went to a doctor to have a mole removed, but insisted that her improved looks are all due to make-up.

Meanwhile, there is still no word on whether Tavia, whose contract with TVB is ending soon, will sign on with the company.

Speculation has been rife that the actress, who has been with TVB for 15 years, had plans to leave the TV station with fellow actor Moses Chan and her long-time manager Chan Ka Lei.

Though Moses and Ka Lei have decided to remain with TVB, Tavia's departure cannot be ruled out as she has been rumoured to have received many attractive offers from Chinese entertainment companies.

Him Law and Tavia Yeung.

Former ‘Two and a Half Men’ Star Angus T. Jones: ‘I Was a Paid Hypocrite’

Former “Two and a Half Men” star Angus T. Jones has addressed his former show once again, saying that he was “a paid hypocrite” for the CBS comedy.

During an interview with Houston television station KHOU, Jones — who played Jake Harper on the series — took himself to task, admitting that he went along with the series even though it didn't fit with his Christian beliefs.

“[The show] was making light of topics in our world that are really problems for a lot of people, and I was a paid hypocrite, because I wasn't OK with it but I was still doing it,” Jones said.

Though Jones is now a student in Colorado and recently spent time with Houston's World Harvest Outreach Church, the 20-year-old added that he would consider acting again, if the gig was in alignment with his religious convictions.

“There's a few different productions that do kind of Bible-based stories and stuff like that,” Jones noted.

Jones parted ways with “Two and a Half Men” last year after blasting the series, calling it “filthy” and imploring viewers not to watch it.

“If you watch ‘Two and a Half Men,’ please stop watching ‘Two and a Half Men,'” Jones said in a video published online. “I'm on ‘Two and a Half Men,’ and I don't want to be on it. Please stop watching it. Please stop filling your head with filth. Please.”

Jones quickly issued an apology for his comments, saying in a statement, “I apologize if my remarks reflect me showing indifference to and disrespect of my colleagues and a lack of appreciation of the extraordinary opportunity of which I have been blessed, I never intended that.”

[official] ♥♥ Charlene Choi Aka Sa (阿sa)♥♥

Talented-Caring-Sweet: Actress, Singer, Model, Author [lots Of Pics]

Welcome to Charlene Choi's 蔡卓妍 Official Thread in Soompi!

Charlene is a really cute actress from Hong Kong. She debuted at the age of 18 in 2000 as a actress, than she debuted as a singer in the most popular Hong Kong band TWINS at 19, and is the youngest female ever to hold a concert in Hong Kong Colisuem. In her short 7 years in the singing industry and 9 years in the movie industry, she has already made over 30 movies, 3 series. Not to mention in the "Twins". Currently working on the movie industry.

Charlene was born in Vancouver, Canada. However her family moved back to Hong Kong a year later. She currently resides in Kowloon. Her height is 5'5".

Charlene studied at a number of different institutions. She attended Marymount Secondary School. In the year 1998, due to her poor academic result and conduct, she was transferred to Rosaryhill School for her studies. In the year 2001, after completed her F.5 studies, she started to become a full-time model in Hong Kong.

In 2001, she was offered to form the Emperor Entertainment Group musical group Twins with Gillian Chung (colloquially known as Gill). Choi since then has been come to known as Charlene, or simply Ah-Sa. In the beginning of twins, there have always been rumors of the two not getting along, mostly because of difference between the two's characters. Gillian was always thought of as the more conservative, and quiet one, while Charlene was the more talkative and outgoing type of character. After 3 or 4 years together, they both had time off and had arranged to go to Taiwan together. After spending so much more stress free time together, they really got to know each other a lot better, and the two have now become best friends. Now after being in the group for over 6 years, twins have announced numerous times that they do not want to be apart, and really enjoy being with each other despite the fact that their management company EEG had suggestions of having the two have solo careers. Twins is now still just as popular as before and have been continuing producing lots of records and movies, and are two of the most successful artists of EEG. Gillian is filming a television series in mainland China, so Charlene has been separated from her for many months now, with many to come, and has been somewhat doing solo acts on TV appearances.

Miley Cyrus's tour bus catches fire and burns down

Miley Cyrus's tour bus has burnt down.

The 21-year-old 'Wrecking Ball' singer is currently traveling the US with her 'Bangerz Tour'.

One of Cyrus's buses caught fire en route to the next tour destination, and was completely destroyed by fire.

The incident happened on Monday night (March 17) as Cyrus's entourage made their way from Houston to New Orleans, where the singer is due to perform tonight.

Nobody is said to have been harmed in the accident, while Cyrus had reportedly already arrived in New Orleans in a separate vehicle.

Cyrus's sister Noah captured images of the bus burning and later posted them on Instagram.

"Cyrus bus down!!!" she wrote, and later added: "Thank u God for keeping us safe" and "Yes, everyone got out safe no one is injured what so ever!! everything is okay!!"

Cyrus's 'Bangerz Tour' has encountered several issues recently, including her tongue slide sparking a lawsuit from a member of staff and Cyrus having to perform in her underwear after missing a costume change.

Meanwhile, a fan of Cyrus was recently arrested after trespassing backstage.

The singer, who recently got a new lip tattoo, is also recording new music with The Flaming Lips.

Anna Kendrick and Seth Rogen will host upcoming episodes of Saturday Night Live.

The long-running sketch comedy series returns to NBC with a new episode hosted by comedian Louis CK on March 29.

Louis CK will be joined by special musical guest Sam Smith, the winner of the BBC Sound of 2014 poll.

Kendrick will oversee the April 5 episode of SNL, along with Pharrell Williams.

Rogen makes his third appearance on Saturday Night Live on April 12, after previously hosting in 2007 and 2009.

His special musical guest will be Grammy Award-nominated singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran.

Saturday Night Live airs at 11.30pm ET on NBC.

Bosco Wong Responds to Relationship Rumors: Talk About It Everyday, Boring the Audience

Wednesday February 5, 2014 Hong Kong

Source: Oriental Daily

Translated by: aZnangel

After Bosco Wong and Vanessa Yeung's 3 month romance surfaced, yesterday [Oriental Daily] obtained a very precious photo of the couple. The couple were caught kissing on camera at the outdoor seating of some restaurant. From the surroundings and their outfits in the photo, they were probably on their date in a Sai Kung restaurant. That day, the two didn't just hold hands and share a cookie, they also shared a sweet kiss!

Just became the new "Mrs. Bosco", yesterday morning Vanessa was spotted driving Bosco's "wife" (antique car) to Tsim Sha Tsui to attend the Hong Kong Film Awards press conference. Vanessa got out of the car with a wide smile on her face. Asked if she's really dating Bosco? She openly admitted: "Yes la, still getting to know one another." She also added she has known Bosco for a long time. Asked if it was Bosco who pursued her? She said: "You all should ask him." When speaking of the two caught on a date in Sai Kung? She smiled: "Just normal social activities. (Held hands and kissed?) Yes la, please give us some space." Asked what she liked about Bosco? Vanessa praised Bosco for being filial and he's ambitious. Is she not afraid of a 'sister-brother' relationship? She said: "Most important is being able to communicate." Asked if Bosco's ex-girlfriend Myolie Wu knew about their relationship? She said: "Thank you all." When Vanessa was getting into her car, reporters kept asking her questions about the relationship, but she just smiled sweetly and did not answer. Asked if she and Bosco are going on a date later tonight? She expressed she's going home.

Also, yesterday afternoon Bosco appeared at TVB City in Tseung Kwan O getting ready work on new series Double Fantasies. Bosco had on the same hat he wore that day when he was spotted kissing Vanessa. Asked about Vanessa driving his beloved car? Bosco said: "She borrowed it. She took my car to the shop. (Why don't you let others borrow the car when they ask?) Well I have many cars and this one doesn't get driven much, so just got someone to use it." Asked what stage their relationship has developed to? He said: "Ok la, still getting to know each other. (So sweet?) I'm very happy now." Asked about their Sai Kung date? He had the same response as Vanessa, "Just normal social activities. We haven't met the parents yet, but my mother already knows about us." He praised Vanessa's high EQ, she's clever and they have things in common. When speaking of a 'sister-brother' relationship, he defended his girlfriend: "Age is not something we consider." Bosco also declared his love, "We were just doing things normal people would do. I hope everyone will give us some personal space. We are both serious towards this relationship and I really hope to get blessings from you all. I would really appreciate it."

Myolie Sends Blessings to Ex-Boyfriend

Yesterday ex-girlfriend Myolie expressed she already knew about the relationship because many people notified her. She's currently in Osaka, Japan and expressed in a long distance telephone interview that she wish Bosco and his girlfriend the best. "Congratulations to them. I wish them all the best." Ex-boyfriend has already found a new lover, what about Myolie? She said: "I'm working hard on it!"

Kate Tsui Clueless about Bosco's New Romance

Former rumored girlfriend Kate Tsui waas asked about "good brother' Bosco Wong's new romance, but Kate asked the reporter back: "Which good brother? I have many good brothers. (Bosco!) Huh? I'm not sure, did he admit it yet? Wait until he tells us first! (Are you going to ask him?) Nope, I don't gossip. You help me ask him! I haven't seen him since the last series we filmed Midas."

Jackie Chan clarifies rumours about health problems

After rumours of his declining health spread due to his late night visit to the hospital, Jackie Chan steps up to address the issue

Hong Kong action star Jackie Chan sparked rumours about his declining health after he secretly made a late night visit to the hospital on Tuesday night.

Jackie, who is turning 60 on April 7, will be holding aPeace & Love & Friendship concert in Beijing one day before his birthday to celebrate with his fans and friends in the entertainment industry.

With his sudden admission to the hospital, it seemed as if the martial artist had problems with his health, but he revealed that he was only there for a body checkup.

Jackie said: “I’m almost 60 and my friends are suggesting for me to go for a checkup, a 24-hour stay is just so I can go through the full body checkup procedure.”

Although Jackie has always been negligent with health checkups, he wanted to set his family’s hearts at ease after hearing about many of his industry friends discovering their ailments too late due to inattention. The checkup was also strongly requested by his actor son Jaycee Chan.

Jackie expressed, “I haven’t had a checkup for more than 8 years, and he (Jaycee) hopes that I can live past 100 years!

Did Ethan Ruan and Tiffany Hsu marry in secret?

Taiwanese actor and actress Ethan Ruan and Tiffany Hsu, who have been dating for seven years, were rumoured to have wedded in secret on Tuesday.

The couple revealed two years ago that they planned to marry in 2014, and last year, both even said that they “could get married any time”.

A source also revealed that Ethan even spent NT100 million (approximately S$4.17 million) on a mansion, which would be their new home.

However, both Ethan and Tiffany denied that they got married. Responding to media queries at his home yesterday, Ethan said: “Don’t listen to what others say” and jokingly told reporters they should ask Tiffany about their marriage matters instead.

At that time, Ethan was carrying a box which resembled a gift box often used in weddings. When reporters tried to verify if the box contained a wedding cake, he exclaimed in reply, “It’s not a wedding cake; it’s just a cake!”

He also denied that he bought the mansion, and brushed reporters off. “Don’t ask me this, I’m busy now,” he said before escaping into his car and sped off. Reporters also spotted Tiffany, who was wearing shades, seated in the car.

Although Tiffany could not be reached for comment, her manager said that Tiffany was actually attending an event on Tuesday, and only ended work at midnight.

When reporters checked with real estate agents on Ethan’s rumoured purchase of the mansion, a staff member admitted that he “came to view the apartment last month.”

He also added that Ethan has been eyeing a 100-square-metre apartment, and they are currently negotiating on the price of the house.

Kim Kardashian Covers Vogue in a Wedding Dress

The supposed rift between Kim Kardashian and Anna Wintour seems to be out like last year's trends. On Friday, the magazine posted their April cover and the "Keeping Up With the Kardashians" star is front and center with her fiancé, Kanye West.

The 33-year-old is wearing a strapless wedding dress with a sweetheart neckline and ballgown bottom and her massive diamond engagement ring in the cover photo, which was snapped by famed shutterbug Annie Leibovitz. Kanye, who's dressed in a suit, is standing behind her with his arms locked at her waist.

The cover line reads: "Kim & Kanye: Their fashionable life and surreal times" with the hashtag #WorldsMostTalkedAboutCouple (which is already being poked fun of online). A video accompanies the cover announcement and features Kim, wearing at least five different dresses during the shoot, behind the scenes with Kanye and their daughter, North.

A black market for Mayday’s upcoming concert?

Illegal salespeople were said to have snapped up tickets and frightened fans

Tickets for Taiwanese rock band Mayday’s upcoming concert in Hong Kong were snapped up in 100 minutes after sales started yesterday, raising concern that there may be buyers who intend to resell tickets at the black market illegally.

Sales started at 10am at various ticketing booths, such as City Hall and Hong Kong Cultural Centre. Some buyers were seen purchasing HK200,000 (approximately S$32,000) worth of tickets, while some were seen teaching Filipinos standing in the queue how to purchase tickets, before passing them slips of paper with dates written on it. The most expensive tickets appeared to have been indicated.

Some fans said that the Filipinos appeared to be resellers from the black market, and apart from cutting queue, they had also frightened fans with their words.

A black market for tickets has started online, and the most expensive tickets at HK980 (approximately S$161) were priced up to five times its original price at RMB 5499 (approximately S$904).

Mayday’s management said: “Mayday is very concerned for their fans, and is calling for the Hong Kong police to deal with the problem, before it escalates.”
